cho_description:
EA520: An 18th Dynasty granodiorite statue of Sekhmet, standing, with papyrus-staff before, base and arms missing or damaged.

Height: 155 centimetres (dorsal pillar) Width: 38 centimetres Depth: 35 centimetres Weight: 500 kilograms (estimated).

This is not on display.

COL: http://www.britishmuseum.org/research/collection_online/collection_object_details.aspx?objectId=111620&partId=1

Made by Daniel Pett from 337 photographs taken with a Nikon D5100.
